alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 3:20PM EDT until May 01 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Alamance County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 320 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Camp Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Cammack Park & Marina, Altamahaw-Ossipee, Lake Burlington, Union Ridge and Altamahaw. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
